DOC.brief_summary: Docetaxel plus Capecitabine in anthracycline-pretreated metastatic breast cancer is a recommended scheme in National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guideline. Vinorelbine plus Capecitabine is also effective in Metastatic Breast Cancer (MBC) in some clinical study with small sample.
DOC.brief_title: Vinorelbine Plus Capecitabine Versus Docetaxel Plus Capecitabine in Anthracycline-pretreated Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised controlled trial of vinorelbine plus capecitabine versus docetaxel plus capecitabine in anthracycline-pretreated women with metastatic breast cancer. The primary endpoints of the study is progression free survival (PFS). The secondary endpoints are overall response rate (ORR), overall survival (OS) and safety.
DOC.criteria: female â‰¥ 18 years old ECOG 02 brain metastasis
